Item.Value: [Text:Hey, $Name$. So I was thinking that now that we've got an $Building_9$ we're going to need a way to make money. We've got a lot of resources nearby, so I think starting with potions might be the best bet. I've enclosed the designs for a $Building_8$, the faster you build it, the faster we can hopefully start attracting more people.][UnlockBuildingID:8]
